title: i hit launch and the game dont open
body: i didnt have the new client until 7.9 patch..after patch i hit launch in game and after that game crashing..it is rnning background and i can see that in stask manager but it didnt open..what can i do to fiix it?please help me

replies.body: It sounds like your OS might need a few adjustments to it's [**permission settings**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) in order to let League launch correctly. Without the right permissions, your OS can think that League isn't safe and shuts it down before it can ever launch. Hit me back up if the steps in that permission guide don't seem to be helping though!
Omg i have the same problem its been 2 days! it wont patch my game at all nothing works i've tried everything -_-
